entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:50 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 3:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SW 27 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:14 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
